subject: SimPedalConfig
description_text:
Preciso do (SimPedalConfig V3.5)
No site não tem disponível para download

conversations.body_text: Hi Arttur Paulo,  May I ask when you made the purchase? I’ll check if I need to provide you with the latest firmware download link and upgrade instructions.

02/2024

artturpauloo@gmail.com


Em qui., 19 de jun. de 2025 às 00:05, support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> escreveu:

> Hi Arttur Paulo,
>
> May I ask when you made the purchase? I’ll check if I need to provide you
> with the latest firmware download link and upgrade instructions.
>
>
>
Hi Arttur Paulo,  Please give this version a try and see if it resolves the issue.

Eu tentei com a V4.0. Não deu certo
